news.title: Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' clears key Senate hurdle after high drama
news.summary: The vote came after hours of uncertainty over whether the massive package could secure enough Republican votes to move to a final Senate vote. The vote came as the Senate is expected to vote on the measure in the next few days.

news.title: Tesla's IPO was 15 years ago. The stock is up almost 300-fold since then
news.summary: A $10,000 investment in Tesla at the time of its 2010 IPO would now be worth close to $3 million. The company went public in 2010 and is now worth more than $30 billion.

news.title: At 20 years old, Reddit is defending its data and fighting AI with AI
news.summary: After two decades, Reddit faces the emergence of AI chatbots that threaten to inhale its vast swaths of data and siphon its users.

news.title: Top Wall Street analysts like these 3 dividend stocks for enhanced returns
news.summary: TipRanks' analyst ranking service discusses three dividend-paying stocks. McDonald's and Halliburton, favored by Wall Street's top pros, are discussed.

news.title: What we know so far about Jeff Bezos' $50 million star-studded luxury Venice wedding
news.summary: Some 200 celebrities and business elite attend. Guests include Ivanka Trump, Usher and Usher. The event was held at the Trump International Hotel in Washington, D.C.

news.title: My job is offering me a payout. Should I take a $61,000 lump sum or $355 a month for life?
news.summary: “My S&P 500 investments have roughly doubled every seven years,” he says. “I’m a big believer in long-term investing.”

news.title: ‘I am horrified’: My company won’t allow me to tip more than 15% for Ubers. Do I explain this to the driver?
news.summary: “I would never even consider tipping less than 20% if it were a personal ride,” she says. “I’m a big fan of tipping at least 20%.”

news.title: My brother stole $100K from my mom to buy bitcoin. Do I convince her to sue him?
news.summary: “He’s so manipulative,” she says of her ex-boyfriend. “He's so manipulative.”

news.title: Robinhood’s Vlad Tenev has led a trading revolution to become a new Wall Street power
news.summary: Vlad Tenev is shaking up the financial order. Backed by an army of retail traders, he is taking on the world of finance.

news.title: Trump administration eyes cuts to student-loan forgiveness for public servants
news.summary: The proposed regulatory text would ban certain employers from being eligible for Public Service Loan Forgiveness. The proposed text from the Education Department would ban some employers from be eligible for PSLF.
